&#3936;&#3930;&#3939;: seek; want; ask; beg; beseech; desire; to understand

O.T. = shes pa.  = mchog pa.  = 'dod pa.  = zhen.  Blan 303.4, 516.5.  Kuijp in JAOS 111, p. 100.  = shes pa, = chog pa, = 'dod pa, = dgos.  BBNP 473.  shes pa. 'dod pa.  za ba.  dgos pa.  Btsan-lha.  dbyangs can dga' blos lam rim chen mo'i brda bkrol las / 'tshal zhes pa ni brda rnying ste / shes pa dang / chog pa dang / 'dod pa dang / dgos pa dang / za ba dang / bgyi ba dang / bya ba sogs la skabs thob kyis shes dgos so zhes gsungs pa ltar 'dir bgyi ba'am bya ba la 'jug go.  Gser Sbram 92.
to prostrate, to exist, "I beg", please, I request

[p btsal],, / (1!; 2) cannot but; 3) exist, be at [lha sar 'tshal ba red: he was in Lhasa]; 4) please, I ask [sku gzugs la thugs cag gnang bar 'tshal: take care of yourself]; 5) do, offer [phyag 'tshal lo: I prostrate]; 6) ask for, seek
[a particle that forms imperative after verbs] [arch]; please. I ask for/ (you) to.; show; verb +: please (do verb); do/ request, beseech; cannot but
